name: integration-analytics-posthog
description: PostHog event tracking, user identification, and feature flags for Next.js
postMessage:
Install: npm install posthog-js

Add to your root layout:
  import { PostHogProvider } from '@/integrations/posthog/posthog-provider'
  <PostHogProvider apiKey={process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_POSTHOG_KEY!} apiHost={process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_POSTHOG_HOST!}>
    {children}
  </PostHogProvider>

Set env vars:
  NEXT_PUBLIC_POSTHOG_KEY=phc_xxx
  NEXT_PUBLIC_POSTHOG_HOST=https://us.i.posthog.com
